name: spark-bot
description: Discord bot for $Stone points and loot box system

scripts.start: node -e "if(process.env.RAILWAY_ENVIRONMENT){require('./dist/index.js')}else{console.log('❌ LOCAL BOT DISABLED - Bot runs only on Railway. Use npm run enable-local to re-enable.');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.dev: echo '❌ LOCAL BOT DISABLED - Bot runs only on Railway. Use npm run enable-local to re-enable.' && exit 1
scripts.pm2:start: echo '❌ LOCAL BOT DISABLED - Bot runs only on Railway. Use npm run enable-local to re-enable.' && exit 1
scripts.pm2:restart: echo '❌ LOCAL BOT DISABLED - Bot runs only on Railway. Use npm run enable-local to re-enable.' && exit 1
